name: AddChatViewComment
description:
Add a new comment to a Chat view.

Use this tool to add a comment to a Chat view in ClickUp. This can be used to facilitate discussion and share information in a specific View context.

parameters.name: view_id
parameters.description: The ID of the Chat view where the comment will be added. Expected as a string.

parameters.name: comment_text
parameters.description: The text content of the comment to be added to the Chat view.

parameters.name: send_notifications_to_all
parameters.description: Set to true to send notifications to everyone, including the comment creator.

value_schema.description: If `notify_all` is true, notifications will be sent to everyone including the creator of the comment.
